## Prelogging inventory

```{r p6_pre_log}
g <- Paracou6_2016 %>% unite(col="GenSp", Genus, Species, sep="_") %>% 
  st_as_sf(coords = c("Xutm", "Yutm")) %>% 
  ggplot(aes(color=GenSp, size=CircCorr/25)) + geom_sf() + theme(legend.position="none")
ggsave("figs/pres_pract_prelogging_inventory.png", g, dpi = 300)
g
```
